results.name: a(n) = n!*Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^k*binomial(2*n,n-k)*n^k/k!.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400

Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
mathematica: Table[n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[-n x/(1 - x)]/(1 - x)^(n + 1), {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 20}]
Join[{1}, Table[n! Sum[(-1)^k Binomial[2 n, n - k] n^k/k!, {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 20}]]
program: (MAGMA) [Factorial(n)*(&+[(-1)^k*Binomial(2*n,n-k)*n^k/Factorial(k): k in [0..n]]): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 06 2018
